item.description:
• Fix karaoke mode's glitchy animations (finally after a whole year!) â€” especially visible in multilingual view
  • Avoid re-opening Spotify if you quit it while Lyric Fever remains open
  • Fix bug where Lyric Fever could unpause a song shortly after pausing it (most visible with Spotify Connect)
  • Improve color generation for non-Spotify lyrics (refresh lyrics to regenerate color for cached songs)
  • Improve menubar view appearance in light mode (significant visual improvement)
  • Fix a crash that could occur when applying lyrics from the search window
  • Change default lyric view to karaoke; default menubar to icon-only to save space
  • Add ability to drag album art from the menubar to share the song link
  • Fix album art flickering when skipping songs within the same album
  • Allow hitting ESC in the search window to hide selected lyrics; searching now hides stale selected lyric previews
  • Fix Spotify login for some users
